sections.MISSION:
Bull Troop conducts M4/M249 qualification training at Range 126 NLT 13FEB24 IOT qualify soldiers on individual weapons systems.
Leader’s

sections.END STATE:
/Training Outcomes:
All Soldiers are safely Qualified on M4/M249.
Concept of the Operation: All will draw their respective weapons systems at Troop.
SMs will link-up at the Troop AO for transportation to Range 126.
SMs will SP to Range 126.
Range set- up tutorial, OIC & RSO brief
SMs will begin training once range is wet and ammo has been dropped off.
SMs will group and zero at Range 126
SMs will conduct M4 qualification and M249 day and night qualification at Range 126 IAW TC 3-22.40.
Safety: All Soldiers will validate a zeroed weapon before the qualification
1x lane safety will be present for each 1x Soldiers on the range
